00001 #include "CPathCommandParser.h"

00009 using namespace std;

00011 namespace jvgs

00013     namespace sketch

00016         {
00017         }

00019         CPathCommandParser::~CPathCommandParser()
00020         {

00022 
00023         void CPathCommandParser::parse(Path *path, char command,
00024                 PathDataParser *dataParser, const vector<float> &arguments)
00025                 const
00026         {
00027             for(vector<float>::size_type i = 0; i < arguments.size(); i += 6) {
00028 
00029                 /* Get the defining points. */
00030                 Vector2D previous = dataParser->getCurrentPoint();
00031                 Vector2D control1(arguments[i], arguments[i + 1]);
00032                 Vector2D control2(arguments[i + 2], arguments[i + 3]);
00033                 Vector2D current(arguments[i + 4], arguments[i + 5]);
00034 
00035                 /* Convert to absolute space. */
00036                 control1 = dataParser->toAbsoluteSpace(command, control1);
00037                 control2 = dataParser->toAbsoluteSpace(command, control2);
00038                 current = dataParser->toAbsoluteSpace(command, current);
00039 
00040                 /* Convert to world space and create the curve. */
00041                 CubicCurve *segment = new CubicCurve(
00042                         dataParser->toWorldSpace(previous),
00043                         dataParser->toWorldSpace(control1),
00044                         dataParser->toWorldSpace(control2),
00045                         dataParser->toWorldSpace(current));
00046                 dataParser->getCurrentComponent()->addSegment(segment);
00047 
00048                 dataParser->setLastControlPoint(control2);
00049                 dataParser->setCurrentPoint(current);
00050             }
00051         }
00052     }
00053 }
